title: Email Compromised
body: I'm trying to change my email on this account since it was compromised but there is no way for me to change it without somehow accessing the email for confirmation. Is there a way to change my email on this account without going to the stolen email to confirm.

replies.body:
Yup! You can reach out in a support ticket using [**this form**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and provide *as many details* as you can recall about your account. One of our specialists will get back in touch with you to continue this process.

Let me know if you have any questions!
